attributes.action: Increase awareness in the public of mental health conditions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people including myself suffer from a mental health condition. In my case Bipolar Affective disorder. I urge you to search hard in yourselves and spend a moment of your time to sign this document. The more we know about mental health the less prejudice there will be. It is important that we realise that people with a mental health condition can with the right treatment and help,  live thoroughly substantial lives. End the prejudice now.
